popularityCurve.label: we wanted an apology from rajinikanth and an apology meant that rajini should seek apology from all the five crore kannadigas for that he has to call a media conference and announce that he regrets for what he had spoken in chennai on the day when the tamil film artists had organised a protest rally the kfcc is always acting against the interests of kannadigas we do not believe a letter to the president of the kfcc will dilute the feeling of hurt among kannadigas we are sure to block the release of the film in any part of the state
